attributes.action: CHANGE THE LAW so that those criticised in lawfully established inquiries are NOT entitled to influence the outcome of any inquiry.
attributes.additional_details: The Chilcott Inquiry has proved that our legal system favours the asylum being taken over and run by the lunatics.  Far too many dishonourable and grossly dishonest people are being given the right to manipulate the law to avoid being called to account, to the people, for their illegal involvement in questionable government activities.  THIS MUST BE STOPPED.
